overview: Join Christy Canyon as she explores sexual motives versus actions, the existential void, and being pretty in peach. People say the most interesting things before, during and after sex. Christy quotes Sartre, Kierkegaard, and Kafka. Sure, sheâ€™ll make it with the Pizza man, but only if he can tell her the meaning of life first!
tagline: When it comes to sex you have to be a little philosophical...
title: Pretty in Peach
